title: Hermanos Cocina Mexicana
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Long-time operating Mexican food restaurant, lounge, and bar. Could ask to substitute most dishes with vegan spicy crumbles and vegan cheese instead of meat and dairy. All rice, beans, and sauces are vegetarian, and many lacto vegetarians selections on the menu. Live jazz and music in the lounge some evenings (no cover charge) - see website calendar.
